title: Buggy game; Slow champ select, 2 people dc'd, 2 people left on 1500+ ping
body: Got into ranked soloqueue with my buddy, when he dc'd. Got into game, enemy kalista dc'd aswell. Me and our Evelyn jungle were left into the game with 1000+ ping, with me not being able to input any movement commands or use abilities, but chat was working perfectly fine. What gives?
